venue.address_2: Corner of State and Pleasant Streets
venue.name: Richdale Food Store

item.description:
It's the 9th Annual Chocolate Tour of Newburyport benefiting The American Red Cross
1:00pm - 5:00pm  
The American Red Cross of Northeast Massachusetts is pleased to host an event of elegant chocolate decadence - our 9th Annual Chocolate Tour of Newburyport! All proceeds from this event will benefit our chapter of the Red Cross.

Cost: $15.00

This walking tour of Newburyport will allow locals and visitors to walk the quaint downtown route, introduce themselves to wonderful local businesses, and partake in delectable chocolate treats and other samples from over 25 participants. 

We will only wait 15 minutes for you to arrive at the meeting place, please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811. 

Remember if you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  We thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  


  We look forward to seeing you, Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be standing in front of the store on the corner of State and Pleasant Streets.
item.name: Red Cross 9th Annual Chocolate Tour
